title: bought RP and didn't recieve it
body: So, today I bought some rp using mastercard, and I didn't recieve anything. Tried it again, this time with a lower amount, didn't recieve anything either, but my money was taken off from my card. Any ideas?

replies.body: Log out and back in, if that doesn't work submit a ticket.
Submit a ticket. DONT charge back. You'll get your account permabanned.
happened to me to i've sent them a ticket
Submit a ticket instead of posting it to the boards.
